flawed_nl_solution:
Henry and Paul collected a total of 11+24 = <<11+24=35>>35 seashells
To make a total of 59, Leo must have collected 59-35 = <<59-35=24>>24 seashells
He gave out a quarter of 24 seashells which is 24*(1/4) = <<24*(1/4)=96/1>>96/1 seashells
They are now left with 59-96/1 = <<59-96/1=-37>>-37 seashells

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 96/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
